        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earthquakes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erdbeben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tremblements de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terremoti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σεισμοί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Terremotos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for intermmediate English students, where the student learns all about earthquakes and answers questions about them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earthquaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geological phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für intermmediate 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen der Kursteilnehmer alle über 
Erdbeben erlernt und Fragen über sie beantwortet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais d'intermmediate, où l'étudiant apprend tous au 
sujet des tremblements de terre et répond à des questions au sujet 
d'elles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do intermmediate, onde o estudante aprende tudo 
sobre terremotos e responde a perguntas sobre elas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del intermmediate, in cui l'allievo impara tutti circa
i terremoti e risponde loro le domande circa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές intermmediate, όπου ο σπουδαστής 
μαθαίνει όλων για τους σεισμούς και απαντά στις ερωτήσεις για 
τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del intermmediate, donde el estudiante aprende 
todos sobre terremotos y contesta a preguntas sobre ellas</string>
          </description>
